title: Antimicrobial topical polymeric films loaded with Acetyl-11-keto-β-boswellic acid (AKBA), boswellic acid and silver nanoparticles: Optimization, characterization, and biological activity
content:
Publication date: 15 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11

Author(s): Muhammad Jawad, Saurabh Bhatia, Ahmed Al-Harrasi, Sana Ullah, Sobia Ahsan Halim, Ajmal Khan, Esra Koca, Levent Yurdaer Aydemir, Sevgin Dıblan, Anubhav Pratap-Singh
